pages.privacy-policy: EliteBet Casino Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters to Us EliteBet Loncation 1 Great Colmore St, Birmingham B15 2AP, United Kingdom Phone +44-121-622-7575 Email elitebet@gmail.com EliteBet Home Comfort Casino Facilities Kitchen Privacy Policy EliteBet, a premier casino-hotel, is committed to protecting the privacy and security of its online visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we may collect from you when you visit our website, how we use that information, and the choices you have regarding our use of this information. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Information Collection and Use We may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily provide it to us, such as when you create an account, make a reservation, or sign up for our newsletter. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and credit card information. We use the information we collect from you to provide you with the services you request, to improve our website and services, and to communicate with you about promotions, special offers, and other information that we believe may be of interest to you. We may also collect non-personal information from you when you visit our website, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. This information is used to help us understand how our website is being used and to improve the user experience. Cookies and Other Technologies We may use cookies and other technologies to collect information about your use of our website. Cookies are small data files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. We use cookies to help us remember your preferences and to improve your experience on our website. You can choose to disable cookies on your browser, but please note that this may limit your ability to use some of the features on our website. Security We take the security of your personal information seriously and have implemented reasonable security measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. However, no security measures can be 100% effective, and we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites that are not owned or controlled by EliteBet. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these other websites and encourage you to read their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will post any changes to this Privacy Policy on our website, and we encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us at elitebet@gmail.com. You understand and acknowledge that the use of our casino gaming services is for entertainment purposes only and does not guarantee any financial return. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when making a reservation, including your name, contact details, and payment information. You also agree to review and comply with any specific terms, conditions, or policies provided by the hotel property at which you are making a reservation. Payments and Billing All payments for casino gaming and hotel booking services must be made through our secure online payment system. You agree to pay all applicable fees, charges, and taxes associated with your use of EliteBet's services. You also authorize us to charge your designated payment method for any amounts due and payable to EliteBet. User Conduct You agree not to use EliteBet for any unlawful, fraudulent, or malicious purposes. You also agree not to engage in any activity that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our website or services. This includes, but is not limited to, hacking, data mining, or using automated scripts to interact with our website. Termination EliteBet reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website and services at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice. Upon termination, you must immediately cease using EliteBet and destroy any copies of materials obtained from our website.
